resources.string:
What is CRYPTOGRAPHY? 
 
This is a way of hiding data to make sure only the recipient is able to see it. 

Please tap on the following button to see the concept and methods.
Welcome to the security training app.This application will provide explanations for the concepts and methods that you will find in the library.

For any enquiries you can see us personally here: Digbeth Campus,
 High Street Deritend, 
 Birmingham 
 B5 5SU 
 
 For any other enquiries please contact us at chera.bhupinder@gmail.com
